title: Astral Chain, Control Review Round-Ups - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.26.19
description:
Time Stamps - 
00:04:55 - Housekeeping
My Control review is up! Kinda Funny Gamescast
PAX is THIS week! Guild Wars event Friday morning, KFGShowcase Friday at 4:30, Inter-Site Championship Saturday at 9! kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:24 - CONTROL REVIEWS
00:10:00 Best Friend Q. - You recorded your initial review thoughts on Thursday but were still trying to determine if the game was good or great. Have you spent more time with it since and if so, how has that impacted which side of the line you fall on? - Trevor Starkey
00:17:35 Best Friend Q. - So Control, how does it compare to other Remedy games?
What kind of improvements do you hope for? Is there a clear line where DLC fits in, like omitted content or wall that will clearly be a door in the future? Or is it vague enough where the story will go next for DLC content? - The Nano Biologist
00:20:18 - ION FURY WHIPLASH
00:43:05 - Persona Franchise Crosses 10 Million Copies Sold, Jeff Grubb @ Venture Beat
00:44:16 - Final Fantasy VIII Sales
00:47:10 - Out today
00:49:36 -  BROOKLINEN
00:51:10 -  UPSTART
Reader mail   -
00:53:48 - “Do you think the Marvel Games slate will ever get near as big as the Movie slate?” - TwoHeadedGiant
01:01:30 - Which one of the new character/series announced/talked about at D23 this weekend would you like to see turn into a game? A Gears of War-like Mandalorian game? An Assassin Creed-like Winter Soldier game? A Sims 4-like LIZZIE MCGUIRE GAME?!?!?! - BJ Bernardo
01:02:40 - Squad Up: David Scott(Game Development: Discord) - DemonWaffle#6387
01:03:30 - You‘re Wrong
This Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Tim
TUESDAY: Andrea and Fran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
GAMESCAST: Wednesday, August 28th @ 2 p.m. - Tim, Greg, Fran, Imran
THURSDAY: Tim and ???
FRIDAY: Tim and ????
